name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game/NeptuniaReBirth1.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES '/DIR=C:/game'
    description: Installing...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
task:
  app: xact devenum quartz wmp10
  arch: win32
  name: winetricks
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
